action.action-desc: Mrs. Steel (for herself, Mr. Webster of Florida, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Mr. Garcia of California, Mr. Rutherford, Mr. Rice of South Carolina, Mr. LaMalfa, and Mr. Calvert) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To prohibit the owner or operator of a port in the United States to enter into a contract with certain entities for operation or management of such port.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Secure Our Ports Act of 2022.

section.header: Prohibition on certain contracts for port operation and management
section.text: An owner or operator of a port in the United States may not enter into a contract for the operation or management of such port with an entity that isâ€”

paragraph.text: a Chinese, Russian, North Korean, or Iranian state-owned enterprise; or
any foreign entity for which any percentage is owned by a country listed in paragraph (1).
